e="preserve">Paolo Sassone-Corsi (8 June 1956 – 23 July 2020) was an Italian researcher and molecular biologist. He was born in Naples, Italy. Sassone-Corsi's work largely focused on the implementation of molecular approaches for cell signaling, circadian rhythm, epigenetics, and the plasticity of the genome.
Sassone-Corsi died on 23 July 2020 in Irvine, California at the age of 64.
